Install

to be done...

How to use

Causal language modelling:

{% raw %} 
from standard_transformer.models import TransformerLM

x = torch.randint(256, (1, 64)) # bs = 1, seq_len = 64
model = TransformerLM(256, 64, max_seq_len=64, causal=True)
out = model(x)
out.shape

torch.Size([1, 64, 256])
{% endraw %}
